title: SCP-5400-J
content:
[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:flopstyle]]
[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]
.foldable-list-container {font-weight: bold;}

:root {
    --background-gradient-distance: 100%;
    --gradient-background: linear-gradient(to bottom,rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,1) 50%, rgba(0,0,0,1) 77% var(--background-gradient-distance));
}

@@ @@
[[=]]
[[div class="note" style="background: #FFFFFF; border: #FFFFFF"]]
[[div class="blockquote" style="background: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/scp_trans.png") center no-repeat; float: center; border: solid 2px #000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]]
+ 警告：以下文档为4/5400-J级机密
----
+++ 任何未经4/5400-J级授权的访问尝试将被记录并立即受到纪律处分。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]
